definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="controls_if" x="394" y="-26"><comment pinned="false" h="52" w="240">Tests if the player is in creative mode. If it is true, then it will open a GUI.</comment></block><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_repeat_ext"><value name="TIMES"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10000</field></block></value><statement name="DO"><block type="move_entity"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.1</field></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="entity_open_gui"><field name="guiname">Pannel</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
